description:
This skill is useful for people taking the US Naturalization Exam administered by the USCIS or those who simply want to test their civics knowledge.  

Think you can answer...

"The House of Representatives has how many voting members?"
"What is one promise you make when you become a United States citizen?"
imageAltText: United States Naturalization Practice Quiz icon
name: United States Naturalization Practice Quiz
shortDescription: This is a quiz game that tests users on their knowledge of general U.S. civics questions.
